roleset.name: steal, be a thief
roleset.note: THIEVE-V NOTES: Expanded, VN updated, by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls steal-10.5. (from thieve.01-v)

example.name: usually adjectival
example.text: There have been cooing doves, chattering magpies, thieving jackdaws, a proud peacock, a silly goose, and a harpy eagle -- whom I was silly enough to mate with and who is now busy tearing at my vitals''.

example.name: occasionally nominal
example.text: It was responsible and sometimes dangerous work because the thieving is awful in the port of New York.

example.name: all args
example.text: In Weston-super-Mare police arrested a man who-1 *trace*-1 had thieved a mattress from a local outlet store
